head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden ¶ 19/1/66 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of two copies of the XVII fascicle of the ferns of Southern India, ¶ which I have gratefully deposited in the li...

div.p: 066/814, unit 177, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: See also J. Moore to M, 18 January 1866. Melbourne bot. Garden

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of two copies of the XVII fascicle of the ferns of Southern India,
Beddome (1863). Although TL2 states that there are only 16 fascicles, there is a note at p. 71, the beginning of fascicle 17, which states that the complete work will comprise 20 parts. which I have gratefully deposited in the library of the establishment.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: your most obedient and humble servant

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
